document_data.name: Cinnamon
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cinnamon''' was a child from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I've got you figured out! You're a spy for the Absolute, like I am!''|Cinnamon}}
document_data.Description: Cinnamon was a [[human]] boy with dark skin, black hair, and dark brown eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Cinnamon spent his days playing with fellow children of the Gate, [[Punkins]] and [[Slow-Butt]]. The kids played as [[steel watcher]]s and spies of [[the Absolute]]. Cinnamon was thoroughly entertained with [[candy]] smuggling and pretending that were parts of the game. When he played a spy of the Absolute, the child cheerfully proclaimed himself not suspicious.
